features.1: Heazy let's you create beautiful vector visuals that can be re-sized to any resolution without loosing quality.
features.2: Export your creations to SVG and PNG or easily copy JavaScript and TypeScript React snippets to your clipboard.
features.3: Heazy prides itself in having some of the most customizable templates on the web. Always create stunningly unique visuals.
features.4: Never struggle with finding ideas again. Click through the options and be sure to always create something beautiful.
features.5: Easily save your coolest templates to your profile. Reuse and randomize your designs as often as you want.
features.6: Share your designs with the world and become inspired by community-created templates, right inside of heazy.
